data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Pleven, Bulgaria.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pleven, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Pleven, Bulgaria to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 4,627 believers in Pleven against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Pleven, Bulgaria to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Arab people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arab people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arab people is yours.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Pleven, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 50 neighbors who are far from you in Pleven. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Pleven, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
